name: Super Adventures Worlds
description:
Run and jump through the fantastic jungle of adventure across 5 worlds and 100 levels. Super Platform Jungle Adventure Best World is thrilling and challenging adventure. This game is a cool running and jumping game. Just jumping to keep as many coins as you can in time limit, but be careful, this places is full of monsters, and they will do something to stop hero. Jump and run with Hero in this platformer through 100 exciting levels. Collect all coins to get more points and buy additional items in store. and you add more levels

Features:
- Classic platformer for all ages
- Jump Collect coins to usurp the pressure the best.
- Play game for a Limited Time
- 5 different and colorful worlds to unlock
- More than 20 levels in each world
- 100 crazy and challenging levels
- Run and Jump Platform
- Suitable for kids and children.
- Very classic and simple control.
- Cool and colorful awesome 2D graphics
- Great music and sounds
